attributes.additional_details: For doctors to be educated more on illness and to listen to their patients more and find out whats wrong with them.People need to feel that are being listened to by their doctors and have the appropriate tests done. Doctors may be busy but people should still get the care that they deserve rather than being made to feel they are wasting the doctors time. Please sign this and help everyone get good care that they deserve. Too many people don't like to go to their doctors because they don't think they will listen this needs to change.
